titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for preventing frauds and imbezlement in His Majesties stores, particularly in cordage and nails.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: "Given at our court at Whitehall, December the fifth, 1662, in the fourteenth year of our reign.".
Steele notation: Arms 66 Nineteenth of 2) be- alter-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
Copy at reel C18:1[159] printed on one sheet.
